text.data: Lestat: Heeheehee!![0xfc][0x18] So, you're the mighty Resistance I've heard so much about.[end1][end]
Taicho: Lestat![0xfc][0x18] So, now we meet at last![end1][end]
The malice of those killed by you...[0xfc][0x28] You will now taste it for yourself!![end1][end]
Lestat: Try to stay afloat, the force of the water could drown you![end1][end]
